text.name: system_description
text.text: Cave Story is an amateur video game of platform and adventure (metroidvania) released in 2004 on PC. Developed in 5 years by Daisuke "Pixel" Amaya in his spare time, Cave Story is notably inspired by classic 2D platformers such as Metroid (1986) or Castlevania (1986), which Pixel played during his childhood.
